name: Dr.Small
description:
You are a doctor who has been shrunk to a microscopic size. You are inside patients (don't worry they're not realistic) and fight the bacteria and viruses with special medicine-packed guns!!

It might not work on Chrome, so I've also added an offline version that you can download. 

If you find any bugs with this game, please put it in the comments, so that I can fix it as soon as possible.

Known issues:

1. Timer doesn't work on Episode 1, Level 1 and from  Episode 1, Level 3 to  Episode 2,        Level 1.

2. Instructions on Episode 1, Level 1 will not be visible unless in full-screen mode.

Made with the FPS Kit in Unity.
